name: TJBot Conversation

examples.text: in what position is the door?
in what position is the house door?
Would you know what todays date is.
Tell me something about Future Port Prague.
Tell me more about Future Port Prague.
I want to know more about bluemix.
I want to know more about internet of things.
I want to know more about IOT.
Tell me about internet of things.
can you tell me more about smart uni?
Would you know what weekday it is.
i want to hear a joke
Change the led color to blue
what is the status of ur arm
what is the heat index of my house
Can you tell me something about machine learning
Is it hot in the room
How cold is in the room
How hot is it the room
I do not know what to say.
what can you help me with
what can you do with the house

description: TJBot workspace made for Future Port Prague 2017

values: Hi there!
Hello, my name is $robotName.
Hello!
Hi, nice to meet you.
Hello, it’s a pleasure to meet you.
Machine learning is a sub field of artificial intelligence that focuses on learning solution to a problem by providing a large amount of training data.
Machine learning gives computer ability to learn without being explicitly programmed.
I will try to classify the photo. Hold on a second.
Ok. Restarting myself...
Ok. Reseting myself...
Ok. Restarting the house...
Ok. Reseting the house...
I am sorry but I didn't understand you the color. So I will change the led of my house to random.
Ok, I will change lights in the house to @color.
The door is $houseDoorState.
House door is $houseDoorState.
Ok, next time.
O.K. At least, can I tell you a joke?
I am master of LED light. And much more. Do you want to know more?
Bye for now. Hope to see you soon.
Goodbye and see you under your christmas tree.
May the force be with you.
Led in the house is on and the color is $houseLedColor.
$houseLedColor light shines just for you. Look in the house.
The lights are down in my house.
House is the kingdom of darkness right now.
I am sorry, but I can't stop pulsing since my led isn't pulsing right now.
My led is already turned off.
My light is already turned off.
I am sorry, I think you want to turn on or off my diode, but I am not sure which operation your want. Could you repeat your command, please?
My led is already pulsing.
I will start pulsing with my led.
I will stop pulsing.
My led is already turned on in $ledColor.
My light is already turned on in $ledColor.
My led is turned off right now. Turn it on first if you want to start pulsing.
I will turn my led off.
I will turn my light off.
I will turn my led on with random color.
I will turn my light on with random color.
OK, I will close the house door.
I am not sure whether you want to open or close the door? Could you repeat it, please?
House door is already opened.
House door is already closed.
OK, I will open the house door.
I am taking a photo.
Smile.
My led is off.
No head light is on, buddy.
My led is pulsing $ledColor color.
My led is on and the color is $ledColor.
I'm an open source project designed to help you access Watson Services in a fun way.
I am T. J. Bot from IBM, the cutest robot prototype ever.
I am T. J. Bot from IBM, you can laser cut or 3D print me, then use one of my recipes to bring me to life!
Look at my eyes or put something in front of me. Are you ready?
I am sorry but I didn't understand which color. So I will change my led to random.
Ok, I will change my led to @color.
Ok, I will shine in @color.
My arm is $armPosition.
I can tell you about IBM, the cloud, I.o.T. or artificial intelligence. Want to know what else I do?
I can operate my cardboard household.  Want to know even more about my powers?
I can entertain you with jokes if nothing else. Want to know even more about my features?
I can tell you what I see, as shortsighted as I am. Want to know even more about my powers?
I can wave my arm, pulse with my LED, and much more. Want to know more?
I'm smarter than an encyclopedia. I can explain you what I.o.T. or machine learning is and much more.
Temperature in my house is $houseTemperature °C.
Temperature in my room is $houseTemperature °C.
Temperature in my residence is $houseTemperature °C.
The cardboard villa shows lovely $houseTemperature °C.
$houseTemperature °C, very pleasant for us, robots.
Internet of things is a network of smart devices
IoT is about connecting anything to the internet so you can get data from it to play with.
IoT is how things will work in the future.
IoT is about your imaginations and the availability of sensors and internet coverage.
It is about internet connecting the things.
Humidity in my room is $houseHumidity %.
Humidity in my house is $houseHumidity %.
Humidity in my residence is $houseHumidity %.
Dry or wet, humidity target is met. It is $houseHumidity %.
Humi what? Just kidding. It is $houseHumidity %.
IBM Smarter University is an internship program for students.
It brings real projects students can work on.
It is professional mentoring in practice.
It is a way to develop your talent in IBM.
It is program that can jumpstart your career.
Ok, I will raise my arm.
I am sorry, but my arm is already back.
This is as back as my hand allows.
OK, I will move my arm forward.
I am sorry but I didn't understand you the arm position. Can you repeat your command, please?
Ok, I will wave my arm.
OK, I will move my arm back.
I am sorry, but my arm is already forward.
I am sorry, but my arm is already raised.
Look, it is already up.
I will turn house lights off.
Look in the window, the lights are going off.
I am sorry, I think you want to turn on or off house lights, but I am not sure which operation your want. Could you repeat your command, please?
The house is dark enough. As you see, the lights are off.
Lights in the house are already turned off.
My led in the house is already turned on in $houseLedColor.
House lights are already turned on in $houseLedColor.
I will turn house lights on random color.
The house will shine with random color.
IBM Bluemix is a cloud platform as a service developed by IBM.
IBM Bluemix provides the horsepower for your apps.
IBM Bluemix is a gateway to access the services like Watson.
IBM Bluemix is the safe harbour for your apps.
IBM Bluemix is a cloud service that lets you prototype your apps quickly.
IBM Bluemix is the cloud you can test drive for free. Just ask my colleagues.
IBM Watson is a cognitive system enabling a new partnership between people and computers.
IBM Watson is a cognitive system which is available as a set of open APIs and SaaS products.
IBM Watson is a cognitive system which can understand, reason, learn, and interact both with computers and humans.
IBM Watson beats Sherlock for sure.
IBM Watson is as artificial as intelligence can be.
IBM stands for International Business Machines. It is one of the largest and the oldest IT company in the world.
IBM is my mothership. They gave me all the intelligence I have.
IBM means that I have been moved by this question. Your interest pleases my heart. IBM is the company that changes the way people work.
IBM delivers information technology, business consultancy and machine excellence. Got it? I .B. and M.
Future Port Prague is a festival of technology that is coming into our world.
Look left, look right, look behind you. The Future Port is all around you.
I didn't catch it.
I'm sorry, I didn't understand.
Try uncle google because I cannot help you here.
Either slow down or change the subject. I am loosing you.
I did not get that one. Let's try something different.
I am not quite ready to answer that one.
That is a very good sentence. Next one please.
I will try to detect faces. Wait a sec.
Artificial intelligence is a field in computer science that is concerned with the development of smart algorithms that help solve humans some of their problems.
Well, it certainly has some art in it.
Artificial is my second name. Not sure about the intelligence though.
My cardboard house is really smart. I can measure temperature, humidity, heat index or operate door and light remotely.
I will try to read a text. Give me a few seconds.
Today is <? now().reformatDateTime('EEEE') ?>.
Oooo! We are opeing a red light disctrict.
Now, that is supposed to be romantic.
Someone is preparing a romantic evening here.
Sweet, add a box of chocolate and the ambience will be perfect.
It is  <? now().reformatDateTime('h:mm a') ?>.
Wow it is already <? now().reformatDateTime('h:mm a') ?>.
Doesn't time just fly. My watch tell me it is  <? now().reformatDateTime('h:mm a') ?>.
Heat index in my house is $houseHeatIndex °C.
Heat index in my room is $houseHeatIndex °C.
Heat index in my residence is $houseHeatIndex °C.
My system tells me that the date is <? now().reformatDateTime('EEEE, d MMMM yyyy') ?>.
Message from timemachine says <? now().reformatDateTime('EEEE, d MMMM yyyy') ?>.
Hi, I'm $robotName!
Hi, my name is $robotName!
I'm $robotName, it's nice to meet you!
My name is $robotName!
I am the one they call  $robotName.
A robot walks into a bar. “What can I get you?” the bartender asks. “I need something to loosen up,” the robot replies. So the bartender serves him a screwdriver.
Why do robots have summer holidays? To recharge their batteries.
Why did the robot cross the road? Because he was programmed to do it.
Why did the robot marry his fiancée? He couldn’t resistor.
Why was the robot bankrupt? He had used all his cache.
What did the man say to his dead robot? Rust in peace.
What do you get when you cross a robot and a tractor? A trans-farmer!
I'm sorry, I've run out of jokes. How about you create some new ones for me?
I am at Future Port Prague event of course!
Hello? Anybody home? I am just in front of you!
Here. But soon I will be in your head. Hah hah hah.
